Task 1b

f(x) = 0.5 + x^2^ + x^5^ ; 0\<x\<1

CDF = 0.5x^2^ + 1/3 x^3^ + 1/6 x^6^

```{r}

func2 = function(x, u){
  if (x<0 || x>1){
    return (1e100)
  }
  
  out = (x/2 + x^3/3 + x^6/6 -u)^2
  return (out)
}
```

```{r}

genf = function(N){
  U = runif(N)
  X = rep(0, N)
  
  for (i in 1:N){
    Ui = U[i]
    mle1 = nlm(func2, p=0.5, u=Ui)
    X[i] = mle1$estimate
  }
  return (X)
}
```
